alert.note: Alert for Eastern San Juan Mountains and La Garita Mountains Including Wolf Creek Pass and Creede; San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 27 at 4:02AM MDT until May 27 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning is in effect TODAY from Noon to 8 PM for gusty winds and low relative humidity values for Fire Weather Zones 223 and 224 which includes the Eastern San Juan Mountains, the La Garita Mountains and the San Luis Valley... ...A Red Flag Warning has been issued for SATURDAY from 11 AM to 10 PM for gusty winds and low relative humidity values for Fire Weather Zones 223 and 224 which includes the Eastern San Juan Mountains, the La Garita Mountains and the San Luis Valley... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 223 AND 224... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 10 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 223 AND 224... The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued Red Flag Warnings for gusty winds and low humidity values for today from noon to 8 pm, and Saturday from 11 AM until 10 pm. * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zones 223 and 224. * Winds...Southwest 20 to 30 mph with peak gusts up to 50 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 7 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread. * Lightning...Isolated cloud to ground lightning flashes will also be possible this afternoon.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Eastern San Juan Mountains and La Garita Mountains Including Wolf Creek Pass and Creede; San Luis Valley Including Alamosa, Del Norte, Fort Garland, Saguache
